contexts.context: ...has always been attracted to transgression and loves mixing <mark>disciplines</mark>. Even when performing in someone else’s stage production...
...the rules of good conduct, in each artistic <mark>discipline</mark> he decides to explore. For Nuno Roque,...
..., subversion, and surrealism, Roque playfully blends <mark>disciplines</mark> into his work. Nothing is sacred for Nuno...
